TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit HybridDictionary extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type HybridDictionary = class interface IDictionary interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 若為小型集合，則使用 實作 ，在它成為大型集合時，切換為 。

span.span: Implements by using a while the collection is small, and then switching to a when the collection gets large.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別被建議的字典中的項目數不明的情況。This class is recommended for cases where the number of elements in a dictionary is unknown. 以利用改善的效能小集合，並提供要切換的彈性處理較大集合優於。It takes advantage of the improved performance of a with small collections, and offers the flexibility of switching to a which handles larger collections better than . 如果集合的初始大小大於為的最佳大小，集合會儲存在以避免額外複製項目從至。If the initial size of the collection is greater than the optimal size for a , the collection is stored in a to avoid the overhead of copying elements from the to a . 建構函式會接受布林值參數，可讓使用者指定集合是否在比較字串時忽略大小寫。The constructor accepts a Boolean parameter that allows the user to specify whether the collection ignores the case when comparing strings. 如果集合是區分大小寫的它會使用的索引鍵的實作和。If the collection is case-sensitive, it uses the key's implementations of and . 如果集合是不區分大小寫的它會執行簡單序數不區分大小寫比較，但是遵守而異的文化特性的大小寫規則。If the collection is case-insensitive, it performs a simple ordinal case-insensitive comparison, which obeys the casing rules of the invariant culture only. 根據預設，這個集合是區分大小寫。By default, the collection is case-sensitive. 如需有關文化特性而異的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on the invariant culture, see . 金鑰不得為 null，但是值可以。A key cannot be null, but a value can. `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 傳回集合中的項目類型的物件。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 因為每個項目是索引鍵/值組，項目型別不是索引鍵的類型或值的類型。Since each element of the is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反地，項目型別是。Instead, the element type is . 例如: For example: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2/VB/source2.vb#2)] `foreach`陳述式是包裝函式，只允許讀取，不寫入至集合的列舉值。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which only allows reading from, not writing to, the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾個屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of . threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 (在 Visual Basic 中) 這種類型的成員都具備執行緒安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此實作不會提供同步處理 （安全執行緒） 包裝函式，但在衍生的類別可以建立自己的同步的版本使用屬性。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`caseInsensitive`是`false`，集合所用的索引鍵的實作和。If `caseInsensitive` is `false`, the collection uses the key's implementations of and . 如果`caseInsensitive`是`true`，集合執行簡單序數不區分大小寫比較，但是遵守而異的文化特性的大小寫規則。If `caseInsensitive` is `true`, the collection performs a simple ordinal case-insensitive comparison, which obeys the casing rules of the invariant culture only. 如需有關文化特性而異的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on the invariant culture, see . 這個建構函式是 o （1） 運算。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合的初始大小大於為的最佳大小，集合會儲存在以避免額外複製項目從至。If the initial size of the collection is greater than the optimal size for a , the collection is stored in a to avoid the overhead of copying elements from the to the . 根據預設，集合是區分大小寫，並使用索引鍵的實作做為雜湊碼提供者和金鑰的實作為比較子。By default, the collection is case-sensitive and uses the key's implementation of as the hash code provider and the key's implementation of as the comparer. 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 這個建構函式為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`initialSize`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `initialSize`.

summary.span: 將有指定索引鍵和數值的項目加入 。

span.span: Adds an entry with the specified key and value into the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有其狀態和其雜湊碼值之間沒有關聯的物件通常不應做為索引鍵。An object that has no correlation between its state and its hash code value should typically not be used as the key. 例如，字串物件做為索引鍵是優於使用 StringBuilder 物件。For example, String objects are better than StringBuilder objects for use as keys. 金鑰不能`null`，但是值可以。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can. 您也可以使用加入新項目，藉由設定機碼值的屬性不存在於; 例如， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the ; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 不過，如果指定的索引鍵已存在於，設定屬性會覆寫舊的值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 相反地，方法不會修改現有的項目。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 當項目數目會變成大於為的最佳大小，將元素複製從至。When the number of elements becomes greater than the optimal size for a , the elements are copied from the to a . 不過，這只會發生一次。However, this only happens once. 如果集合已經儲存在和項目數目低於的最佳大小，集合會保留在。If the collection is already stored in a and the number of elements falls below the optimal size for a , the collection remains in the . 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將加入和移除項目從。The following code example adds to and removes elements from a . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_AddRemove/CPP/hybriddictionary_addremove.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_AddRemove/CS/hybriddictionary_addremove.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_AddRemove/VB/hybriddictionary_addremove.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個方法會使用集合的物件和方法`key`來判斷是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `key` to determine whether `item` exists. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷和方法`item`參數集合中的物件。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例中的項目會搜尋。The following code example searches for an element in a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 將元素複製到以相同的順序，以列舉值逐一。The elements are copied to the in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the . 若要複製中的索引鍵，使用`HybridDictionary.Keys.CopyTo`。To copy only the keys in the , use `HybridDictionary.Keys.CopyTo`. 若要複製的值中，使用`HybridDictionary.Values.CopyTo`。To copy only the values in the , use `HybridDictionary.Values.CopyTo`. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將複製的項目到陣列。The following code example copies the elements of a to an array. summary.span: 傳回透過 重複的 。

span.span: Returns an that iterates through the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列舉項目。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator/CPP/hybriddictionary_enumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator/CS/hybriddictionary_enumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator/VB/hybriddictionary_enumerator.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean
public: property bool IsFixedSize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出 是否有固定的大小。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.
This property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作屬性因為的需要介面。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 具有固定大小的集合不允許在集合建立後新增或移除項目，但允許對現有項目進行修改。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合是唯讀的集合只以防止新增或移除項目; 包裝函式因此，如果變更基礎的集合，包括新增或移除項目，固定大小的集合會反映這些變更。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出 是否唯讀。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.
This property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作屬性因為的需要介面。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出 是否為同步 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is synchronized (thread safe).
This property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作屬性因為的需要介面。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 在衍生的類別可以提供的同步化的版本使用屬性。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the using the property. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2/CPP/source2.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2/CS/source2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2/VB/source2.vb#3)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public object this[object key] { get; set; }
Default Public Property Item(key As Object) As Object
public: property System::Object ^ default[System::Object ^] { System::Object ^ get(System::Object ^ key); void set(System::Object ^ key, System::Object ^ value); };
member this.Item(obj) : obj with get, set

param.name: key
param.span: 索引鍵，要讀取或設定其值。

span.span: The key whose value to get or set.

summary.span: 取得或設定與指定之索引鍵相關聯的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value associated with the specified key.

value.span: 與指定之索引鍵關聯的值。

span.span: The value associated with the specified key.

value.span: 如果找不到指定的索引鍵，嘗試取得它將傳回 ，而嘗試設定它將以指定的索引鍵建立新的項目。

span.span: If the specified key is not found, attempting to get it returns , and attempting to set it creates a new entry using the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以使用下列語法提供存取集合中特定元素的能力：`myCollection[key]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]`. 您也可以使用加入新項目，藉由設定機碼值的屬性不存在於; 例如， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the ; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 不過，如果指定的索引鍵已存在於，設定屬性會覆寫舊的值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 相反地，方法不會修改現有的項目。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 金鑰不能`null`，但是值可以。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can. 若要在區別`null`傳回因為找不到指定的索引鍵和`null`傳回指定之索引鍵的值，所以`null`，使用方法來判斷是否索引鍵存在於清單中。To distinguish between `null` that is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` that is returned because the value of the specified key is `null`, use the method to determine if the key exists in the list. C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 擷取這個屬性的值是 o （1） 運算。設定屬性，也是一種 o （1） 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列舉項目。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator/CPP/hybriddictionary_enumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator/CS/hybriddictionary_enumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator/VB/hybriddictionary_enumerator.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中值的順序並未指定，但它是關聯值中的相同順序傳回方法。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the returned by the method. 傳回不是靜態的複本; 相反地，中原始的索引鍵是指回。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the keys in the original . 因此，變更為才會反映在繼續。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列舉項目。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不包含具有指定之索引鍵項目維持不變。If the does not contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. 如果集合已經儲存在和項目數目低於的最佳大小，集合會保留在以避免額外複製項目從回到.If the collection is already stored in a and the number of elements falls below the optimal size for a , the collection remains in the to avoid the overhead of copying elements from the back to a . 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將加入和移除項目從。The following code example adds to and removes elements from a . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_AddRemove/CPP/hybriddictionary_addremove.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_AddRemove/CS/hybriddictionary_addremove.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_AddRemove/VB/hybriddictionary_addremove.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得可用以同步存取 的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用以同步存取 的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本使用屬性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須在上執行作業的、 直接依據。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體而言，保持正常的同步處理與其他可能同時修改的執行緒物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2/CPP/source2.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2/CS/source2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary2/VB/source2.vb#3)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上，呼叫擲回例外狀況。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，則呼叫擲回例外狀況。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫或會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果之間修改集合和，傳回項目所設定，即使列舉值已經無效。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列舉項目。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 中值的順序並未指定，但它是關聯的索引鍵中的相同順序傳回方法。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the returned by the method. 傳回不是靜態的複本; 相反地，中原始的值是指回。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the values in the original . 因此，變更為才會反映在繼續。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列舉項目。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator/CPP/hybriddictionary_enumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator/CS/hybriddictionary_enumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary_Enumerator/VB/hybriddictionary_enumerator.vb#1)]
